Eunice violacea Grube, 1856
.

REMARKS : It is possible that some following reports of other
Eunice
species (particularly
E. rousseai
) from the Adriatic Sea actually refer to
E. purpurea
. Detailed analyses of both deposited and new material from the Adriatic Sea is needed to resolve this problem.

.
